name: [Demo] On The Flip Side
description:
(also known as Flip Side) is a card game where every card has 2 sides with different effects. Sometimes even opposite. You can flip the cards any time you want, to twice the amount of tactical options!

Similar to Slay the Spire, you start each run with a new basic deck and upgrade it as you go.

Follow me on twitter to be notified when the new stuff comes out!

Also you can watch the development of new content in this open Trello board

Release notes: (current: v1.1)

v1.0: Original jam version, made in 48 hours. Can be played here: gm(48) (it's worse than v1.1 in every way)

v1.1: Fixed some stuff, changed balance and added fetching new cards from server (to not re-download the game every time)
